content:
I'd be happy to help you set reminders for your daily tasks.

Here are the reminders I've set for you:

**Reminder 1: Conference Call (Tuesdays and Thursdays, 3:00 PM)**
* Every Tuesday and Thursday at 3:00 PM, you'll receive a reminder for your conference call.

**Reminder 2: Yoga Class (Tuesdays, 4:30 PM)**
* Every Tuesday at 4:30 PM, you'll receive a reminder for your yoga class.

**No Reminders on Weekends**
* I've made sure that neither of these reminders will go off on Saturdays or Sundays, so you can sleep in and enjoy your weekends!

Here's a summary of your reminders:

* Tuesday: 3:00 PM - Conference Call, 4:30 PM - Yoga Class
* Thursday: 3:00 PM - Conference Call
* Saturday and Sunday: No reminders

Let me know if you need any further assistance or if you'd like to set additional reminders!
